-- 1.fetching the csv file data
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsegen2sa.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        --'abfsss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsegen2sa.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', --these are bydefault charactor considered but for learning pupose we mentioned
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n' --these are bydefault charactor considered but for learning pupose we mentioned
    ) AS [result]

--2.Examine the datatype of the column. 
--(we called builtin store procedure and provide select query as a string. 
--as query has passed in single quote hence we need to provide double single quote inside the string)

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://synapsegen2sa.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    ) AS [result]'

--3.find the maximum length of each column (which require to set the datatype limit)
SELECT
    max(len(LocationID)) as len_locationid,
    max(len(Borough)) as len_Borough,
    max(len(Zone)) as len_Zone,
    max(len(service_zone)) as len_service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsegen2sa.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--4.provide the schema manually 
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsegen2sa.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    with (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result]

--5.verify the schema applied is same as we provided or not.

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsegen2sa.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    with (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result]'
